column1: Topic title: It s over  PAS elders approve decision to cut ties

column8: text

Pas kearah government
Selow

sure lah, when bawang says X, grass roots also follow. najib says he not related with 1mdb, grass roots believed him too.PAS is splitting the votes. BN will rule for another 50 years. tahniah najib for good strategy
They say it is with immediate effect. So Selangor gone.
Ayam moar surprised if they say cut ties with ameno.
tahniah BN, indeed.
who is bawang?
So, by right PAS the seats won by PAS in selangor no longer count as PH right?
don't make pas angry.see... selangor bn will win.
No hope at all for opposition party now. Bercukurlah.
I guess their internal machinations to stop Hadi have failed.He also changed the former PAS Selangor commissioner.
As Hillary said, At this point what difference does it make?
LOL GG. BN confirm takes Selangor coming election.
Become bn toy now
nah i don't belip Selangor will fall to BN.. but i'm just curious, if they cut ties, why ar still in the Selangor gomen? terus quit all post including the JKKK and in the surau oso...

Bcoz Azmin already said two days ago, current Selangor gomen are mandate from people in GE 13. So everyone will stay until end of this term. Well, on the other hand, current Selangor gomen is basically Azmin Gomen
PAS said they will continue to respect the mendate people gave to them. Its a good excuse actually

column7: From: Clerking. Data Entry like a Mad Man
column8: but still muka tebal dowan resign from PKR-led selangor state government. principle mana principle?ppl give mandate to PR, not PAS per se. but oh well, we see if this year got GE or not lah

The mandate was given when they were part of a coalition - Pakatan Rakyat.. With the break up of the coalition, shouldn't they go back to the people to determine if the people still want them? it seems they don't know why they were voted in the first place.. or they just buat dunno.. since got a taste of power already.. its hard to let go..
Minus the b then u will know who

Thats y I think azmin should bubar the DUN. If PAS just hold a small number of seats, sure no need, but thats not the case. Let the selangor people decide who they really want. Coz right now 1 part say PAS won bcoz of DAP supporters, 1 other part say PKR won thanx to PAS supporters n so on. So now we can actually know who selangor people want.But im sure azmin no balls to bubar. His seat was won just a bit higher than BN candidate last ge. His position is the most fragile 1 right now.
No, we ready to rumble. Jgn jadi penakut, aritu ugut PAS mcm2. PAS dah activate special Card nie, bubar la dun tu. Jgn ckp je pandai, tp hati kecut.
A party sabotager period
betol nak sunat ke
i tot macai said pkr already strong on their ownn no need pasy their leader wanna pas back? macai know best?
Got option to fire what. Azmin dun want to use that card?

column7: From: Clerking. Data Entry like a Mad Man
column8: eh good idea oso...ya lah why azmin kecut ka
I predict BN will take over selangor in next GE with simple majority.
you cannot assume that.people voted for the candidate.the ballot didn't have BN vs Pakatan.

Why you have symbol on the ballot papers? anyway wouldn't this be an opportune time to prove that they have the support of the rakyat, that Hudud is wanted by all,  and get rid of their political enemies at the same time?
because they represent that party/coalition.was there a Pakatan symbol or PAS symbol for PAS candidates?
Can't even unite for a common goal, but wanna rule the country konon.

pkr saja ka? DAP pun sama. kononya kuat sangat, bising2 last sekali duk diam diam mcm penakut(FMT) – Selangor DAP says it has no problem working with the three PAS executive councillors in the state administration, so long as they don’t stray from the joint framework and manifesto used in the 2013 general election.Speaking to reporters after launching a business conference, Teng Chang Khim, who is the Selangor DAP vice-chairman, said there was “no necessity” for a reshuffle of the state administration as the next general election was near.
